resources.string:
I am a brazilian Software Developer that works mostly with embedded systems, but as of right now I'm learning Kotlin and Android development with a focus on Smart Payment Terminals (or Smart POS devices). 
Besides payment applications, I'm interested in developing games, AR/VR applications, IOT and embedded machine learning solutions. 
The latter is the focus of my graduation thesis for my Bachelor\`s degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro, which I'm currently developing as I write this app. 
If you found this app or source code and would like to get in touch, feel free to send an e-mail my way at tomazcuber@outlook.com :)
